data.name: Moirai
data.detailed_description:
The townsfolk tell you that a woman named Julia has gone missing. You venture out into the cave just beyond the village looking for her. You're given a knife to protect yourself. What you find there may surprise you.

Moirai is an experimental, first person game created by Chris Johnson, Brad Barrett and John Oestmann.

data.short_description: The townsfolk tell you that a woman named Julia has gone missing. You venture out into the cave just beyond the village looking for her. You're given a knife to protect yourself. What you find there may surprise you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 - Lion
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 26 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64bit
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
